comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body:
In testing, I found a reuse bug in this stemmer! 
This would cause it to stem when it should not.

Attached is an updated patch with a specific test for this.

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body: ok I think this one is ready. I'd like to commit in a few days (trunk,3x) unless anyone objects.

description:
This is an implementation of http://www.illc.uva.nl/Publications/ResearchReports/MoL-2003-02.text.pdf

The only change is that I added an option to disable derivational stemming, 
in case you want to just remove inflectional particles and possessive pronouns.
